name: GHERHART (Otozip)
description:
GHERHART is an awesome tower defense game, game in which you have to manage your resources well so as not to lose your castle. To move to the next level, the gold-collecting troops must reach the sphere 30 times.

The game contains 4 chapters and 3 levels for each one.

⦁ Chapter 1 "The Woods" This chapter has 7 mobs: 2 tipes of snails, snakes, bees, frogs, insects, and for the boss fight a giant frog.

⦁ Chapter 2 "The Dunes of Death" This chapter has 5 mobs: sand snakes, insects, bugs, sand worms, and for the boss fight a giant bug.

⦁ Chapter 3 "Frosty Night" This chapter has 5 mobs: polar bears, ice bugs, ice slimes, a giant lump of snow, and for the boss fight a giant ice bug.

⦁ Chapter 4 "Spooky Mansion" This chapter has 7 mobs: ghosts, zombies, mice, bats, worms, and for the boss fight a giant spooky bug and a giant bat.

The game ends when you complete all 4 chapters.
